field.name: menutype
field.label: Select Menu
field.description: Choose a menu to display.

field.name: jQuery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: Enable or Disable the latest jQuery version. Make sure that jQuery is loaded only once on your website.

field.name: touchWipe
field.label: touchWipe
field.description: Enable or Disable the TouchWipe jQuery Plugin.

field.name: Fixed
field.label: Fixed Menu
field.description: If set to YES, the menu will be fixed to screen when scrolling down the page.

field.name: Mobile
field.label: Mobile Menu
field.description: Enable or Disable mobile menu on smaller screens.

field.name: MenuDirection
field.label: Menu Direction
field.description: If set to YES, the menu will be fixed to screen when scrolling down the page.

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Menu start level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: Menu end level.

field.name: menuFontSize
field.label: Menu Font Size
field.description: Set menu font size. (ie. 13px, 13em)

field.name: menubg
field.label: Menu Background
field.description: Choose background color for first level menu.

field.name: menulink
field.label: Menu Link
field.description: Choose link color for first level menu.

field.name: submenuFontSize
field.label: Sub-Menu Font Size
field.description: Set menu font size. (ie. 11px, 11em)

field.name: submenubg
field.label: Sub-Menu Background
field.description: Choose background color for sub-menu menu.

field.name: submenulink
field.label: Sub-Menu Link
field.description: Choose link color for sub-menu menu.

field.name: menubghover
field.label: Hover/Active Menu Bg
field.description: Choose background color for hover and active menu.

field.name: menulinkhover
field.label: Hover/Active Menu Link
field.description: Choose link color for hover and active menu.

field.name: menuradius
field.label: Rounded Corners
field.description: Menu end level.

field.name: fontStyle
field.label: Google Font Style
field.description: Only for accordion title.

field.name: screenMax
field.label: Screen Max Width (px)
field.description: Menu will switch to mobile-menu when browser window width equals or less then specified value.

field.name: tag_id
field.label: Menu Tag ID
field.description: An ID attribute to assign to the root UL tag of the menu (optional)

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the menu items
